She got -|His last words|Breaker of Chains}}'''Guymon''' is a minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[Jem Wall]] and only appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He lives with his [[Olly's mother|wife]] and [[Olly|son]] in a village close to [[the Wall]].

===[[Season 4]]===
When he and his son are on their way home for dinner, their village is attacked by a group of [[wildlings]]. He is killed by an arrow to the head from [[Ygritte]]. His body is later eaten by [[Styr]].<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
